summary: Human Resources professional with extensive experience in a one-person HR role supporting 63 employees. Skilled in recruitment, training, onboarding, policy development, compliance, HRIS, payroll support, employee relations, and performance management. Strong analytical, interpersonal, and organizational abilities with a track record of improving staffing and training processes.

experience.title: HR Director
experience.description: Communicated orally and in writing with children, parents, staff, volunteers, guardians, therapists and case workers; developed, implemented and monitored training programs for employee retention; drafted and revised policies and procedures in accordance with federal, state and county laws; pre-screened candidates to ensure strong fit; managed onboarding and ongoing HR data entry; liaised with media/advertising/sponsorships; created budgets and generated reports; coordinated new hire onboarding and orientation; ensured compliance of confidential personnel files; supported disciplinary processes and employee relations; maintained payroll-related inquiries and Kronos questions; collaborated with management to resolve issues and improve organizational effectiveness.

experience.title: Administrator
experience.description: Administered HR duties including recruitment, staff development, onboarding, benefits administration, and records management; maintained confidential personnel files and ensured legal compliance; conducted new hire orientation; managed payroll inquiries; served as liaison between employees and service center; coordinated communications and training programs; prepared budget reports for events; supported exit processes; ensured accurate data entry and documentation.

experience.title: Event Specialist
experience.description: Supported event planning and coordination activities; assisted with logistics, vendor coordination and stakeholder engagement.

experience.title: Assistant Director
experience.description: Oversaw administrative and program duties; Notary Public; CPR and First Aid certifications; liaised with state agencies to support program operations.

education.degree: MS in Human Resources Management / Management and Leadership
